payable","name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"transferOwnership","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"@ziweidream","methods":{"bet(uint256,address,uint256,address,address,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"this function can only be called by the GameManager contract","params":{"_bettor":"the address of the bettor who placed the bet","_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_lastBetAmount":"the last bet ether amount placed by the supported player in the game","_opponentPlayer":"the address of the opponent player in the game","_randomNum":"the random number generated when the supported player presses Button Bet in the game","_supportedPlayer":"the address of the supported player in the game"}},"getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_lastBetAmount":"the last bet ether amount placed by the supported player in the game","_randomNum":"the random number generated by the front end when Button bet is pressed by the given corner","_supportedPlayer":"the given corner in this game for whom the attack type is randomly selected"},"return":"the attackType randomly selected for the given corner, the attackHash for the attackType selected, and the index of the attackHash returned in the fight map"},"getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the blocked attacks are obtained"},"return":"an array of fixed size 7 blockedAttacks, which contains the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in this game"},"getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the direct attacks are obtained"},"return":"an array of fixed size 7 directAttacks, which contains the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in this game"},"getLastBet(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"if the given corner has never placed a bet in this game yet, the last bet amount is 0","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game whose last bet ether amount is displayed"},"return":"the last bet ether amount by the given corner in a game"},"getLastFourBets(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"lastBet1 is the last bet, lastBet2 is the second last bet, and so forth","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game whose last 4 bets amount are displayed"},"return":"the last 5 bet ether amount by the given corner in a game"},"getNumberOfBets(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_player":"the given corner in this game whose individual bet ether amount is recorded"},"return":"the number of total bets placed by the given corner in a game"},"isAttackBlocked(uint256,address)":{"author":"@ziweidream","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_opponentPlayer":"the address of the opponent player in this game"},"return":"true if the attack type is blocked, false if it is direct"},"randomGen(uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","return":"The random number generated"},"setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"this function is only called by GameManager contract","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_originalDefenseLevel":"the original defense level of the given corner, which is calculated in the function startGame() in GameManager","_player":"the address of the given corner in this game for whom the defense level is recorded"}},"startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"author":"@ziweidream","details":"this function can only be called by the GameManager contract","params":{"_gameId":"the gameID of the game","_randomBlack":"the random number generated when the Black corner presses the Button Bet","_randomRed":"the random number generated when the Red corner presses the Button Bet"}}},"title":"This contract is responsible to carry out the betting module in a game"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"bet(uint256,address,uint256,address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"determines the attack type, attackHash, and current opponent defense level partially depending on the effect of each bet placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"randomly select attack types from low values column or high values column depending on the bet ether amount by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game"},"getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game"},"getLastBet(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the ether amount of the last bet placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"getLastFourBets(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the ether amount of the last 5 bets placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"getNumberOfBets(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get the number of total bets placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"isAttackBlocked(uint256,address)":{"notice":"determine whether the attack type by the supported player is blocked or direct in a game with a specific gameId"},"randomGen(uint256)":{"notice":"generates a random number from 0 to 100 based on the last block hash, blocktime, block difficulty, and seed"},"setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"record the original defense level of the given corner in a game with a specific gameId"},"setProxy(address)":{"notice":"Set/update address of Proxy contract"},"startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"generates a fight map for a game with a specific gameId, and calculates the original defense levels of both corners in this game"}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/C/Users/Alex/Desktop/MyProjects/contracts/contracts/modules/algorithm/Betting.sol":"Betting"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/C/Users/Alex/Desktop/MyProjects/contracts/contracts/ContractManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbb76b64132545b5384c2123c5cd2524476d11e4c4cae0d816cd5c1886a25d4ed","urls":["bzz-raw://ee62162f452af353245c50e74253320e6ca955af0cf11a38ff547bca7b837865","dweb:/ipfs/QmRZb6LpJZ6vn4akW5oRU7CTVuqCu9w9w4yWwDR8ahE8Jr"]},"/C/Users/Alex/Desktop/MyProjects/contracts/contracts/authority/Guard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x880695867e15879cd65b858fc85a5a0464718d3a94231a2f0c87b6598c372e77","urls":["bzz-raw://edcd5eeceac47a6b1b20705c999edab81f0d93bf96ae71b9561c0185550db8b7","dweb:/ipfs/QmNc5Tk2amTvQoNQnoE3uwGMgnEQCMeES49whgJu3iBR8q"]},"/C/Users/Alex/Desktop/MyProjects/contracts/contracts/authority/Owned.sol":{"keccak256":"0x77b729e841e4418ccb6b304717287cc72780663c1ffc3ed589da39fbf74402f0","urls":["bzz-raw://91eacbd34b0ae153385c4d22f6c382664b8f6203e79aebe953af25319bf317fd","dweb:/ipfs/QmfWdq68iwvPfSa9UqYtuRqWvgGUxFbMNMsCT4wDEFpjyf"]},"/C/Users/Alex/Desktop/MyProjects/contracts/contracts/authority/SystemRoles.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1b51fce867f9e31e5b0f4a627d123abab01506ea12ca5ada81c6a679de629fec","urls":["bzz-raw://57cd9e8a120cc54af82d1e16ebbed2834eca87863f804da5c7a2441c84879a1e","dweb:/ipfs/QmZPuipMN4s1BmZ3uLYphsSsPSkXujeu5UyHFh9THaUDHp"]},"/C/Users/Alex/Desktop/MyProjects/contracts/contracts/interfaces/IContractManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd42ff3ca1863499f6d4b9213756d2bca7219a7fabe0229c004c521a9b863b2c7","urls":["bzz-raw://5c59650eb833c2cfb5761236c99c44bf90ebd1e2a18dea7c9787ea9dfa51222b","dweb:/ipfs/QmdTGDa37vJjucj85VSTipk5rhPwTRYV9sfVzRKqSwLVWW"]},"/C/Users/Alex/Desktop/MyProjects/contracts/contracts/libs/LinkedListAddrLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf56efbe8afb84a9cfec4503b4d77dcf9f744fba6b31eb744ac0e369bff29f6f5","urls":["bzz-raw://cebd2ce9c665ce8398b00a5420e6d8ac nodes.name: getAttackType
isAttackBlocked
reduceDefenseLevel
randomGen

bet

devdoc.author: @ziweidream

bet(uint256,address,uint256,address,addr.author: @ziweidream
bet(uint256,address,uint256,address,addr.details: this function can only be called by the GameManager contract

params._bettor: the address of the bettor who placed the bet
params._lastBetAmount: the last bet ether amount placed by the supported player in the game
params._opponentPlayer: the address of the opponent player in the game
params._randomNum: the random number generated when the supported player presses Button Bet in the game
params._supportedPlayer: the address of the supported player in the game

getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,ui.author: @ziweidream

params._lastBetAmount: the last bet ether amount placed by the supported player in the game
params._randomNum: the random number generated by the front end when Button bet is pressed by the given corner
params._supportedPlayer: the given corner in this game for whom the attack type is randomly selected

getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,ui.return: the attackType randomly selected for the given corner, the attackHash for the attackType selected, and the index of the attackHash returned in the fight map

getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream

params._player: the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the blocked attacks are obtained

getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address).return: an array of fixed size 7 blockedAttacks, which contains the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in this game

getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream

params._player: the given corner in this game for whom the total number of the direct attacks are obtained

getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address).return: an array of fixed size 7 directAttacks, which contains the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in this game

getLastBet(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream
getLastBet(uint256,address).details: if the given corner has never placed a bet in this game yet, the last bet amount is 0

params._player: the given corner in this game whose last bet ether amount is displayed

getLastBet(uint256,address).return: the last bet ether amount by the given corner in a game

getLastFourBets(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream
getLastFourBets(uint256,address).details: lastBet1 is the last bet, lastBet2 is the second last bet, and so forth

params._player: the given corner in this game whose last 4 bets amount are displayed

getLastFourBets(uint256,address).return: the last 5 bet ether amount by the given corner in a game

getNumberOfBets(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream

params._player: the given corner in this game whose individual bet ether amount is recorded

getNumberOfBets(uint256,address).return: the number of total bets placed by the given corner in a game

isAttackBlocked(uint256,address).author: @ziweidream

params._opponentPlayer: the address of the opponent player in this game

isAttackBlocked(uint256,address).return: true if the attack type is blocked, false if it is direct

setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,.author: @ziweidream
setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,.details: this function is only called by GameManager contract

params._originalDefenseLevel: the original defense level of the given corner, which is calculated in the function startGame() in GameManager
params._player: the address of the given corner in this game for whom the defense level is recorded

startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256).author: @ziweidream
startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: this function can only be called by the GameManager contract

params._randomBlack: the random number generated when the Black corner presses the Button Bet
params._randomRed: the random number generated when the Red corner presses the Button Bet

devdoc.title: This contract is responsible to carry out the betting module in a game

bet(uint256,address,uint256,address,addr.notice: determines the attack type, attackHash, and current opponent defense level partially depending on the effect of each bet placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

getAttackType(uint256,address,uint256,ui.notice: randomly select attack types from low values column or high values column depending on the bet ether amount by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

getBlockedAttacksScored(uint256,address).notice: get the total number of blocked attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game

getDirectAttacksScored(uint256,address).notice: get the total number of direct attacks of each hitType of the given corner in a game

getLastBet(uint256,address).notice: get the ether amount of the last bet placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

getLastFourBets(uint256,address).notice: get the ether amount of the last 5 bets placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

getNumberOfBets(uint256,address).notice: get the number of total bets placed by the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

isAttackBlocked(uint256,address).notice: determine whether the attack type by the supported player is blocked or direct in a game with a specific gameId

randomGen(uint256).notice: generates a random number from 0 to 100 based on the last block hash, blocktime, block difficulty, and seed

setOriginalDefenseLevel(uint256,address,.notice: record the original defense level of the given corner in a game with a specific gameId

startGame(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: generates a fight map for a game with a specific gameId, and calculates the original defense levels of both corners in this game
